oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mack scores again, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about Colonial Foods. The caption reads: “This Mack truck, together with three Mack tractors equipped with trailers, recently delivered to the C. B. Ragland Company, wholesale grocers. Dependable delivery and economical operation, which the Mack always gives, prompted the purchase. Mack Sales & Services, 516 McGavock Street, Howard Youree, Distributor.” The 1941 City Directory cites C. B. Ragland Company: C. S. Ragland, President; F. W. Wharton, Vice-Pres., wholesale grocers and coffee roasters, Colonial Foods and Coffee, 300-314 2nd Avenue S. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ragland family
C. B. Ragland (Nashville, Tenn.); Colonial Foods (Nashville, Tenn.)
